page.title: 12HOUSING 03800597
page.content:
There are{six council houses}in the village.The remainder of the housing used to be{owned by}Lord Redesdale.Now he owns only 4 houses in the village and one farm outside, letting these except for one he uses as a holiday home.There are two more weekend homes. {The Ministry of Defence}owns several houses and farms .
Apart from 2 modern bungalows the {newest houses}are the council ones built in 1947.The main body of housing in the village was built in the early {19th century.}Many farms are much older, some having been there for 300 years. As the area is in the National Park and also contains listed sites, {planning permission can be difficult } to obtain and refusals have been encountered.
